column4: i am getting the error "unable to retrieve buddy list" from the facebook plugin for pidgin any ideas?

your way behind lol -- the one in the Ubuntu repo has been broken for weeks http://code.google.com/p/pidgin-facebookchat/ and install the 1.63 deb and you should be good to go.  OH YA, uninstall one from Repo first and you also have to logout after the new install before it seems to work?
okay so where am I getting the new version?
from that code.google.com link i sent
i need a 64 bit version that looks like only 32 there
? strange i'm running 64 bit OS too?  don't remember having to force the install but perhaps i did???
says I am logged in but I am not seeing any facebook folks
are you set to Available?  try loging out/back in as well.
got it thanks - much owe you a coffee
are you using Karmic or something earlier?
flash works quirkily in firefox on 64 bit.  works fine however, in opera and chrome
sudo apt-get purge google-chrome-stable   The following packages will be REMOVED:   google-chrome-stable*  Q.E.D.
does 11.04 have the unity interface, or is gnome still an option?
classic Gnome is still an option
thanks I might d/l it and give it a shot.
